title: cultural_data_Amphitheatre_of_Nîmes
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.culturespaces.nimesAndroid.
Application Name: Amphitheatre of Nîmes.
Number of Reviews: 13.00.
Application Description: This application invites you to embark on the discovery of the Amphitheatre of Nîmes and the most emblematic monuments of the city (“Maison Carrée”, “Tour Magne”…). This application includes: - A commented 80 minutes guided-tour: through 17 points of interest and several thematic distractions, you will discover the history of this site, the Roman Antiquity and the world of gladiators,- A geolocalised visit: from the “Maison Carrée” to the “Tour Magne”, passing by the “Carré d’Art” and the “Jardins de la Fontaine”, discover monuments incontournables de la ville de Nîmes,     - Over 150 enlargeable HD pictures, - 2 interactive maps allowing you to navigate easily,- Practical information to prepare your visit.   Powered by smArtappsRead moreCollapse.
